release.action: Added option document-encoding to the merge-modules and merge-modlets commands of the command line application.
Added command show-model to the command line application.
Added options specification and implementation to the generate-resources, manage-sources, commit-classes and validate-classes commands of the command line application.
Corrected the classes-dir option of the command line application to disallow multiple values.
Corrected the validate-classes command of the command line application to display any validation report details and to exit with a failure code when detecting invalid class files.
Corrected the merge-modlets command of the command line application to exclude the applications' modlets when not included otherwise.
Corrected a ClassCastException thrown by the merge-modules command when providing a stylesheet producing an illegal transformation result.
Corrected a ClassCastException thrown by the merge-modlets command when providing a stylesheet producing an illegal transformation result.

Added options default-template-profile, indentation, input-encoding, line-separator, model-context-class, modlet-schema-system-id, no-resource-processing, output-encoding, resource-file-processor-class, template-encoding, template-location, template-profile, country and locale-variant to the generate-resources command of the command line application.
Added options model-context-class, no-source-processing, source-file-processor-class, language, country and locale-variantto the manage-sources command of the command line application.

Added options class-file-processor-class, default-template-profile, indentation, input-encoding, language, line-separator, model-context-class, modlet-schema-system-id, no-class-processing, output-encoding, template-encoding, template-location, template-profile, stylesheet, country and locale-variant to the commit-classes command of the command line application.

Added options class-file-processor-class, default-template-profile, indentation, input-encoding, language, line-separator, model-context-class, modlet-schema-system-id, no-class-processing, output-encoding, template-encoding, template-location, template-profile, country and locale-variantto the validate-classes command of the command line application.
Added options model-context-class and modlet-schema-system-id to the merge-modules command of the command line application.
Added options model-context-class and modlet-schema-system-id to the merge-modlets command of the command line application.
Added options model-context-class and modlet-schema-system-id to the validate-model command of the command line application.
Added options model-context-class and modlet-schema-system-id to the show-model command of the command line application.
Added option resource-names to the merge-modlets and merge-modules commands of the command line application.

Added option no-modlet-resource-validation to the commit-classes, generate-resources, manage-sources, merge-modlets, merge-modules, show-model, validate-classes and validate-model commands of the command line application.

Added option no-modlet-resource-validation to the commit-classes, generate-resources, manage-sources, merge-modules, show-model, validate-classes and validate-model commands of the command line application.
Corrected the resource-dir and source-dir command line arguments to disallow multiple values.
Updated the merge-modlets and merge-modules commands of the command line application to add system properties to Transformers as parameters.
Added a stylesheet option to the commit-classes command of the command line application to support class file transformations.
Removed optional oro Java archive from distribution.
